cleaned_text: Alternative Medicine Alternative Healing Site content © 2018 Jane E King, all rights reserved. Design by Jane E. King JaneE is a Certified Energy Medicine Practitioner, certified in Brennan Healing Science, a Certified Hypnotist, Ordained Minister, earth ceremonialist and educator with over 20 years experience teaching and practicing energy medicine, intuition, holistic health, earth honoring ceremonies and more. After 25 years in the business world, health issues steered her to earth based solutions to health and wellness. Her expertise and heart based practice of energy medicine, herbalism, primal healing ceremony, and equine assisted approaches to healing, align her to be your conduit of healing and change through these practices. Her clear contact with the infinite spiritual dimensions facilitate permanent life changes. JaneE offers individualized heart infused healing sessions and life changing group programs utilizing the healing wisdom of the ancients and other [esoteric tools](success) as called upon by the energy and soul of the client. JaneE's [healing sessions](healing_session_payment) are available [by appointment](contact). Distant or remote healing wherever you are in the world transcends linear space/time thus being a powerful method to receive and attain the same benefits as an in-person session. She has been making [Medicine Drums](drums) and facilitating her [Medicine Drum](drums) shaman drum building workshops since 1997. You may want to purchase her one of a kind [Deer ](deer_medicine_drum) Medicine Drum. Go to [drum page](drums) for information about Medicine Drums. The [Feathers](feather_readings) have spoken. They say they have messages for those on the Path. They fell off the shelf one day and told JaneE to read them for others. The method they gave her is sure and true. It is a healing by feathers. [Contact JaneE](contact) for a reading today. JaneE is creator, producer and hostess of a community access television show, [New Earth LIFESTYLES](new_earth_lifestyles). No longer on the air, you can watch past episodes on her [YouTube Channel](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC3EZh-uvdB-fMiF0sElYe5Q).
